overview: Use angle sums and triangle properties.
refresher: Angles on a straight line sum to 180°. Triangle angles sum to 180°.

S.title: Find missing angle on straight line

practice.stem: In a triangle with angles 45°, 55°, the third is?
answer_steps: Step 1: The sum of angles in a triangle is 180°.

hints: Mark given angles on a sketch.
reflection: Which angle rules do you know?

section_test.stem: Find the missing angle: 120°, __, 30° on a straight line.
answer_steps: Step 1: Angles on a straight line sum to 180°.

section_test.stem: What is the sum of angles at a point?
answer_steps: Step 1: Angles at a point sum to 360°.
